subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Mike Smith and Drosselmeyer rallied in the homestretch to overtake Chantal Sutherland and Game On Dude, winning the Breeders’ Cup Classic at Churchill Downs.
snippet: Mike Smith and Drosselmeyer rallied in the homestretch to overtake Chantal Sutherland and Game On Dude, winning the Breeders’ Cup Classic at Churchill Downs.
